title: Openings for Business Analyst
description:
Business Analyst (technical)

Experience – 6+ Years

Job Mode – Full time

Work mode – Remote


Collaborate with stakeholders to gather, document, and analyze business requirements.
Translate business needs into functional and technical specifications (user stories).
Conduct feasibility studies, risk assessments, and cost-benefit analyses.
Work with development teams to design and implement system solutions.
Develop and maintain process workflows, diagrams, and other documentation.
Facilitate workshops, meetings, and presentations with stakeholders.
Test and validate systems to ensure alignment with requirements.


Provide ongoing support and training for implemented systems.
